name: OpenNewsnet
description:
No paywall or ads on any newsnet site.

Working: 24heures.ch, tdg.ch

DEFUNCT:
23.03.2020: No longer working on tagesanzeiger.ch!
20.01.2020: No longer working: derbund.ch, bernerzeitung.ch, bazonline.ch

Sorry my friends: As the paywalls for these newspapers are now realised on the server-side, it is no longer possible to bypass them using CSS.
